name: Ultra Type-R
description:
Ultra Type-R is a fast paced runner with a twist; to perform actions, you must type them. In order to overcome the obstacles presented in the game, you'll need to think and type fast.

You control Hana, Earth's representative on the 47th Intergalactic Space Race. Hana's competition record on Earth is impeccable, but now she has a new challenge: to win for the first time the most important race of the universe.

Current Features:

Ultra Type-R is still a work in progress. The features present on Version 0.1 are as follows:

  • 25 levels
  • 6 actions to perform
  • 200+ crystals to collect
  • Medal system
  • Progress saving
Planned Features:

For the full version of Ultra Type-R, we have some planned, but not confirmed features, such as:

  • Story Mode
  • Endless Mode
  • Leaderboards
  • More characters
  • More backgrounds/tilesets

By purchasing the game, you'll have access to all future updates. The Demo Version 0.1, however, will always be playable for free.

If you have purchased the game, the initial version that you'll receive will be Version 0.1, just like the free demo. An email will be sent to you as soon as a new version launches, exclusive for buyers.
